power.title: Bastion of Defense
power.fluff: Your demeanor grows ever more encouraging, helping your allies to keep up their morale

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following benefits:
If an ally can see and hear you when he or she starts his or her turn inside the aura, that ally gains temporary hit points equal to your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
If the ally is bloodied, he or she instead regains that many hit points.
If you hit with an attack on your turn, you and allies in your aura gain a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Calculated Assault
power.fluff: You prove your superior command of the situation

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, while the target ally is in your aura, he or she gains a bonus to damage rolls equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
You can use a minor action to choose a different ally in your warlord's aura. If you do, that ally becomes the target for this benefit and the previous ally loses the benefit.

power.title: Concentrated Attack
power.fluff: You and your companions combine your attacks to deliver a nasty blow

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following effect:
When you hit an enemy with an attack on your turn, allies in your warlord's aura gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against that target until the end of your next turn.

The first time an ally hits the target, that ally can choose to either increase the power bonus by +1 or to end the bonus. If he or she chooses to end the bonus, it is applied as a bonus to the hitting attack's damage roll.

power.title: Destructive Lead
power.fluff: You lead a foe to focus on yourself, then signal an ally to strike at just the right moment

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following effects:
When you make a melee attack on your turn, you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
When an enemy marked by you makes an attack that doesn't include you, you can use an immediate interrupt to allow an ally to make a melee basic attack against that enemy.

power.title: Expert Timing
power.fluff: You guide your comrades to take full advantage when an enemy staggers

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following benefit:
Enemies in your aura provoke opportunity attacks when they end a pull, push, or slide. You or an ally cannot take the opportunity attack if he or she is the source of the forced movement.

power.title: Lead the Attack
power.fluff: Under your instruction, arrows hit their marks and blades drive home

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, while the target enemy is in your aura, allies in your warlord's aura gain a bonus to attack rolls against the target enemy. The bonus equals one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier (minimum bonus +1).
If you hit the target enemy with an attack, the bonus increases to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier until the start of your next turn.
When the chosen enemy drops to 0 hit points or less, you can choose a new enemy in your warlord's aura as a free reaction to become the target.

power.title: Orchestrated Offensive
power.fluff: You follow your strike with a signal to your allies, guiding them along the battle's coreography

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, when you hit with a basic attack, you can choose two allies in your warlord's aura. Until the end of your next turn, both allies gain your choice of either:
A power bonus to damage rolls equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
A bonus to attack rolls with triggered attacks equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
A bonus to all defenses against triggered attack rolls equal to your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
A power bonus to all defenses equal to one-half your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier. This increases to your full [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier if the ally is bloodied.

power.title: Pin the Foe
power.fluff: No matter where your foe turns, one of your allies is waiting for it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following effects:
► Enemies in the aura cannot shift if at least either two of your allies or you and one of your allies are adjacent to it.
► Allies in the aura add your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier to melee damage rolls against enemies they flank.

power.title: Relentless Wounding
power.fluff: With firm commands, you guide your allies to focus their efforts

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following effects:
As long as you can see the target, allies in the aura gain a bonus to damage rolls against it. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier (minimum bonus +2).
If you hit the target with an attack, the next attack an ally makes against it can score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.
When the chosen enemy is reduced to 0 hit points or less, as a free reaction you can choose a new enemy you can see within 10 squares.

power.title: White Raven Onslaught
power.fluff: You instruct your allies to overrun enemy defenses

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your warlord's aura gains the following effects:
Allies who either start or end a charge attack in the aura gain a +2 bonus to any attack rolls made as part of that charge.
If an ally misses a charge attack against a target in the aura and deals no damage on a miss, he or she instead deals one-half of the minimum damage that would have been dealt on a hit.
